entry.title: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura Review

media:group.media:title: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura Review
media:group.media:description:
From the creators of the original Fallout games comes Arcanum. A fantasy RPG about the dynamics between technology and magic, and the endless despicability of gnomes. media:group.media:title: Duskers Review
media:group.media:description:
Duskers is a strategy horror game about sending drones into derelict spaceships to find out why humanity has vanished. Love capable of transcending dimensions of time and space not included. media:group.media:title: Marathon Infinity Review
media:group.media:description:
From Marathon to Halo, Infinity to Infinite. Marathon Infinity makes you question your destiny across time and dimensions, but it already knows who you are. media:group.media:description:

media:group.media:title: Pathways Into Darkness Review
media:group.media:description:
Pathways Into Darkness is a dungeon crawling FPS that takes you on a marathon inside an eldritch pyramid where you're tasked with destroying an elder god. That's the straightforward part. Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/MandaloreGaming Thanks to @tat2kid714 (Dakota Lee) for the thumbnail art! media:group.media:title: Marathon Review
media:group.media:description:
Before Bungie made Halo, they made Marathon. Then they kept putting Marathon stuff into Halo. Now 343 just sprinkles it in here and there. Praise the Aleph One team for keeping it alive. entry.title: Anonymous Agony: An Extra Edgy Adventure Game

media:group.media:title: Anonymous Agony: An Extra Edgy Adventure Game
media:group.media:description:
Whatever you think Anonymous Agony is, it's likely to be even worse than that. It's the definition of an ancient evil and I'm sorry. media:group.media:title: RUINER Review
media:group.media:description: RUINER is a stylish fast-paced cyberpunk action game probably inspired by Ghost in the Shell and Drive. It's very red. Also it's not Hotline Miami, stop it.
